question: 赤
sourceAnswer: red/crimson/scarlet | red-containing-colour-(e.g.-brown,-pink,-orange) | Red-(i.e.-communist) | red-light-(traffic) | red-ink-(i.e.-in-finance-or-proof-reading)/(in)-the-red | complete/total/perfect/obvious | copper | red-5-point-card
sourceMnemonic: The kanji and the word are exactly the same. That means they share meanings as well.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This has the same reading as the kanji you learned, meaning you know the reading!
